subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: The trainer Michael Matz’s horse won easily at Gulfstream Park in a performance reminiscent of Matz’s 2006 Derby winner, Barbaro.
snippet: The trainer Michael Matz’s horse won easily at Gulfstream Park in a performance reminiscent of Matz’s 2006 Derby winner, Barbaro.
